content:
Hi Everyone
I have setup zulip production environment. As on development Environment we have .scss files located here scss image and .hbs files here hbs image . But I did not find any path on production for .scss and .hbs files. where can I locate them in production environment?
Thanks
@Arslan you can't edit those in production; they are shipped compiled in the release tarball. You can find the compile assets under prod-static.
@Tim Abbott but can we make changes on local and then compile and deploy them to production? If yes, what is the procedure?
@Arslan yes, read about upgrade-zulip-from-git; it's our recommended workflow.
